publisher.value: HL7 International - Electronic Health Records Work Group

description.value: The set of codes that define specialized observation types of a wound.

definition.value: An observation or observation componenet describing the shape of a wound. Temporary local code system to be replaced with LOINC code TBD.
An observation or observation componenet describing the volume of a wound. Temporary local code system to be replaced with LOINC code TBD.
